scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm ci && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
